scripts.java.lang.String: CREATE TABLE DOMAIN ( ID BIGINT, DATE VARCHAR(50), CATEGORY NVARCHAR(200), NAME NVARCHAR(200) )

CREATE TABLE META ( ID BIGINT, DOMAIN_ID BIGINT, TITLE NVARCHAR(1000), DES NVARCHAR(2000), IMAGE VARCHAR(500), TIME VARCHAR(100), SOURCE_TIME VARCHAR(100), URL VARCHAR(500), CONSTRAINT META_FK FOREIGN KEY (DOMAIN_ID) REFERENCES DOMAIN (ID) )
CREATE TABLE CONTENT( META_ID BIGINT, DATE VARCHAR(50), CONTENT NTEXT, CONSTRAINT CONTENT_FK FOREIGN KEY (META_ID) REFERENCES META(ID) )

CREATE TABLE RELATION( META_ID BIGINT, RELATION_ID BIGINT, "PERCENT" INTEGER, CONSTRAINT META_ID_FK FOREIGN KEY (META_ID) REFERENCES META(ID), CONSTRAINT RELATION_ID_FK FOREIGN KEY (RELATION_ID) REFERENCES META(ID) )
CREATE TABLE IMAGE( ID VARCHAR(200), META_ID BIGINT, CONTENT_TYPE VARCHAR(200), NAME VARCHAR(200), IMAGE IMAGE, CONSTRAINT META_ID_FK FOREIGN KEY (META_ID) REFERENCES META(ID) )
